item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 28, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple needs a Snow Sequoia (843 points | 610 comments)
2. Preschoolers can reason better than we think, study suggests (28 points | 10 comments)
3. Architecture Patterns with Python (193 points | 37 comments)
4. Learn to code, ignore AI, then use AI to code even better (99 points | 93 comments)
5. The Last Stand of the Corporate Peacock (17 points | 17 comments)
6. Giant, fungus-like organism may be a completely unknown branch of life (156 points | 69 comments)
7. PermitFlow (YC W22) Is Hiring Senior/Staff Engineers in NYC ( | hide)
8. A decompilation and port of Sonic Advance 2-a GameBoy Advance game written in C (159 points | 29 comments)
9. I drove 300 miles, then asked police to send me surveillance footage of my car. (3 points | discuss)
10. Things I would have told myself before building an autorouter (242 points | 47 comments)
11. How to Use Em Dashes (–), En Dashes (–), and Hyphens (-) (439 points | 324 comments)
12. Tracing the thoughts of a large language model (803 points | 280 comments)
13. Google is publishing the home addresses of developers without their consent (57 points | 23 comments)
14. Using uv and PEP 723 for Self-Contained Python Scripts (209 points | 83 comments)
15. A note on the USB-to-PS/2 mouse adapter that came with Microsoft mouse devices (237 points | 65 comments)
16. Retreating Glaciers Expose 1,500 Miles of Coastline (7 points | 2 comments)
17. Jevons Paradox: A Personal Perspective (6 points | 2 comments)
18. How I Choose What to Work On (2023) (50 points | 12 comments)
19. 7.7 magnitude earthquake hits Southeast Asia, affecting Myanmar and Thailand (90 points | 29 comments)
20. Mid-pregnancy pollution exposure linked to postpartum depression (18 points | 3 comments)
21. I tried making artificial sunlight at home (407 points | 186 comments)
22. Let's Take a Look at JEP 483: Ahead-of-Time Class Loading and Linking (5 points | 1 comment)
23. Entropy Attacks (17 points | 3 comments)
24. Postgres Extension Tutorial (11 points | discuss)
25. On Tyranny [book] (31 points | 4 comments)
26. Every Flop Counts: Scaling a 300B LLM Without Premium GPUs (78 points | 3 comments)
27. Golang on the Playstation 2 (144 points | 7 comments)
28. I genuinely don't understand why some people are still bullish about LLMs (472 points | 830 comments)
29. Learning Theory from First Principles [pdf] (164 points | 20 comments)
30. iPhone users can now set WhatsApp as their default calling and texting app (22 points | 18 comments)
